title: Hidden Hot Spring Hunters?
detail_text: <:th_ch0207/>Finally, it’s time for you to take me to that hidden hot spring......!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Fufu, Secchan, are you ready?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Yup! After hearing from you and Umi, I did what I thought was the necessary training.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Well, it’s not that much of a treacherous path......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>No, Emma-san told me repeatedly not to underestimate the mountains. Climbing without proper preparation could be fatal!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>That is true.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>We might have to take an unmarked path, stick closely to the cliffs, and entrust our lives to a single rope...... We have to expect such a trek! To the legendary hidden hot spring!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>You’re kinda exaggerating, but you’re not wrong! Come on, let’s move!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Let’s go, Mari-san. Let’s push ourselves to our limits!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Yes! The legendary hidden hot spring is waiting for us!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
